data.title: The Outside Directory
data.meta_description: The Outside Directory is a growing list of studios, agencies, foundries, organisations, networks, and individuals, working in the Creative Industries outside of London.
data.text:
&Something andsomething.studio DesignShrewsburyWest Midlands
